name: Spewpa
description: The Scatterdust Pokémon. It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is affected by a negative status ailment, they can roll a d4 at the end of each of their turns. On a result of 4, they are cured.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when an ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is hit by an attack, it may choose to halve the damage dealt.
